<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/ga4gh/wes/v1/runs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Uses the GA4GH workflow execution service API to list all run records.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page_size","in":"query","description":"Page size","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"page_token","in":"query","description":"Page token","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"runs":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"run_id":{"type":"string"},"state":{"type":"string","enum":["UNKNOWN","QUEUED","INITIALIZING","RUNNING","PAUSED","COMPLETE","EXECUTOR_ERROR","SYSTEM_ERROR","CANCELED","CANCELING"],"title":"State"}},"title":"RunStatus"}},"next_page_token":{"type":"string"}},"title":"RunListResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"msg":{"type":"string"},"status_code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"WesErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Operation not allowed"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
